Posts.EditableText: well, David.... seeing as i have a guy from Activision/Delta Force Games/3D Game Artists working with me to make Vortex: RF, a free graphical MMORPG, and seeing as i'm also developing Feudal Ages, another graphical MMORPG, helping develop an online MuD engine, moderating the Qbite forums, re-developing Deity Online, AND working my ass off to produce http://www.squiggleuk.com , i can't see how you think i'm just messing around. Not to mention i've added ASL as a programming language to the list, as i think this language has the potential to become BIG, it can do almost anything mud game-wise, and already has it's own IDE i don't post on these forums much anymore because of my commitment to the work im currently doing, and when im done with other stuff, i'll maybe produce a small IF game for my website

ROFL!!!! you're so funny. Anybody who looks at that will know it's not PHP Nuke. All you have to do is look at the source code lol.

The proof is, this is the ONLY bit of PHP on the WHOLE website, and it's in index.php


<?

if ($page == null) {
	$page = "update";
}
$ftbi = $page.".php";

if (file_exists($ftbi)) {
include $ftbi;
}
else {
echo "Sorry $page could not be found.<br><br>";
}

?>


all it does is include the contents of another html file which has a .php extension instead of .html
